code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Container}from"react-bootstrap";import"./HealthBlog.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HealthBlogDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[blog,setBlog]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL,"/healthblogs/").concat(id)).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setBlog(data));},[id]);if(!blog)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"health-blog-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/healthblog",className:"mb-3 d-inline-block blog-back",children:"\u2190 Back to blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"detail-title mb-2",children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-muted",children:["By ",blog.author," - ",blog.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"asset/image/healthBlog/".concat(blog.thumbnail),alt:blog.title,className:"img-fluid rounded mb-4 detail-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"detail-content",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:blog.content}})]});};export default HealthBlogDetail;
